TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @electronic{leferrand2024ntu, author = {Le Ferrand, {'E}ric and Prud'hommeaux, Emily and Hartshorne, Joshua K. and Sung, Li-May}, year = {2024}, title = {{NTU} {Paiwan} {ASR} Corpus},type = {Electronic Resource}}

S.FORM: aicu a pinui’inaljanan a sinan kakudan tua ’iniladjan nua sevuculj, mavan a sangasangasan a aljak a tjemalevak ta ‘inaljan
napenapamav ta u’aljay ta vavayan a kakudan
aicu a pinui’inaljanan a sinan kakudan tua ’iniladjan nua sevuculj, mavan a sangasangasan a aljak a tjemalevak tua ’iniladjan i ’inaljan katua kinitjuayan na sevalitan,
ipu u’aljay ipu vavayan, kana vusam timadju tjara makaya a temalevak tua kinitjuayan, ngadan nua uma’ kata ’iniladjan i ’inaljan,
makeljang tu aicu a sevuculj mamav a sipacunan tua vavayan kata u’aljay, aicu mana sikizengezenger nua sevuculj a cawcau.
aicu a kakudan na sevuculj mavan a aljak a sangasangasan mana pitjuma’en a pa’iladj, kemasi ta vunglay a sangasangasan a pacun ta ’adav a aljak, mavan a uri pitjuma’en a masan vusam,
’aw kana vusamsun tjara tisun a temalevak ta kikavecengel kata ’iniladjan i ’inaljan na su sevalitan, ipu u’aljay ipu vavayan.
aicu a kakudan na sevuculj, a vavayan a pucekelj a semata u’aljay, a u’aljay a kitarev a semata vavayan, kakudan azua a patjetucu na sevuculj.
’aw aicu a seravar maretimalji kata sevuculj a kakudan,
tiamadju nu u’aljay a vusam mana makaya a temalevak ta kinitjuayan, ngadan na uma’, ‘iniladjan ’iniladjan i ’inaljan na sevalitan,
aicu a vavayan a vusam neka inika makaya a temalevak, nu neka nu u’aljay a aljak kimana kinemnemanga ta vavayan a temalevak.
manasika aicu a pakatua sangasangasan a aljak, mana makaya a temalevak a kakudan na sevuculj, izua masan tjelulj a napenakisumalji,
a sangasangasan, napenapamav a sipacunan ta u’aljay kata vavayan na sevuculj, a u’aljay a vavayan makaya sakamaya masan vusam,
manasika tjuruvuanga vavayavayan a na zemang i tjuma’, a kitarev a u’aljay mana vavayan a na djemadjas ta kinacemkeljan.
a i ’inaljan i tua sevuculj tjuruvu angauta vavayan a mamazangiljan, namayatucu a napenapamav ta u’aljay kata vavayan aicu a ’inaljan i tua sevuculj.
a sipasan musalj, aicu a pitjuma’ ta sangasangasan a aljak a temalevak ta nemenemang na sevalitan, nangua’angata, neka nu marivurivu, na mareka nanguangua’ a ta’alja’aljan.
a sipasan tjelulj, makaya a pazurung ta nanguangua’ a kakudan na sevuculj.
kumaljiy a maumaljanga tucu a ziday a ipalingulj a nemanga, aicu a seman vusam ta sangasangasan a aljak na sevuculj a kakudan,
patjetucu sipazuruzurunganan na sevuculj, inianan kana maumalj.
